ideas.title: Mozilla’s new CEO says AI is coming to Firefox, but will remain a choice

Browser Wars: How Mozilla Fights Back with AI

ideas.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini
ideas.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to create their own custom apps.
hooks: AI Mini-Apps: Google's Opal Transforms Coding Forever
Gemini's Secret Weapon: Build Apps with Vibes
Code Without Coding: Opal's Revolutionary Approach
